title: Physical Education Design Applying Nonlinear Pedagogy: Constraint-Led Approach (CLA) Practicum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physical education theory and understanding of traditional teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: A process for acquiring nonlinear pedagogical methods applicable to elementary physical education settings through theory and practice, exploring interdisciplinary approaches between pedagogy and mathematics

learning_goals: Explain core principles of CLA (e.g., learner-environment interaction, nonlinear learning design)
Apply CLA to physical education lesson design and develop at least three concrete activity scenarios
Design at least two types of CLA-based formative assessment tools for large-scale online learners
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
